name: Bitey Shark
description:
After either side switches characters, and Mualani is the active character: Spend 1 Nightsoul point to apply Bite Target to the opposing active character.
Technique: Sharky Surfboard
When the character to which this is attached has 0 Nightsoul points, discard this card. When this card is discarded, the attached character's Nightsoul's Blessing ends.
